account_id.description: Microsoft account ID used for the calendar query.

days_ahead.description: Number of days ahead to fetch events (1-365).

include_details.description: Whether to include full event details such as attendees and body content.

limit.description: Maximum number of events to return (1-200).

use_cache.description: Allow returning cached results when available.

force_refresh.description: Bypass cache and fetch fresh results when true.
